TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeDescriptor extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关组件特征的信息，如组件的特性、属性和事件。

span.span: Provides information about the characteristics for a component, such as its attributes, properties, and events.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 提供了两种方法访问的类型的元数据： 反射 API 中提供命名空间，和类。The .NET Framework provides two ways to access metadata on a type: the reflection API provided in the namespace, and the class. 反射是可用于所有类型的常规机制，因为其基础中建立根的方法类。Reflection is a general mechanism available to all types because its foundation is established in the method of the root class. 它不能修改的目标类型在编译后，是不可扩展的它返回一种类型的信息。The information it returns for a type is not extensible, in that it cannot be modified after compilation of the target type. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的主题[反射](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)。For more information, see the topics in [Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md). 与此相反，是组件的可扩展检查机制： 这些类实现接口。In contrast, is an extensible inspection mechanism for components: those classes that implement the interface. 与不同的反射，它并不检查方法。Unlike reflection, it does not inspect for methods. 可由多个服务可通过目标组件动态扩展。 can be dynamically extended by several services available through the target component's . 下表显示了这些服务。The following table shows these services. |服务名称Service name|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||启用另一个类，例如，以提供给组件的额外属性。Enables another class, such as , to provide extra properties to a component.| ||使另一个对象，可以修改由组件公开的标准元数据。Enables another object to modify the standard metadata that is exposed by a component.| ||使类可以完全且动态地指定自己的元数据，替换的标准检查机制。Enables a class to completely and dynamically specify its own metadata, replacing the standard inspection mechanism of .| 提供的可扩展性允许从实际运行时表示形式，这使不同的组件的设计时表示有助于生成设计时基础结构。The extensibility provided by allows the design-time representation of a component to differ from its actual run-time representation, which makes useful for building design-time infrastructure. 中的所有方法是`static`。All the methods in are `static`. 无法创建此类的实例，不能继承此类。You cannot create an instance of this class, and this class cannot be inherited. 可以设置属性和事件值两种不同方式： 组件类中指定它们，或在设计时更改它们。You can set property and event values two different ways: specify them in the component class or change them at design time. 因为您可以设置这些值的重载方法的两种方式采用两种不同类型的参数： 类类型或对象实例。Because you can set these values two ways, the overloaded methods of take two different types of parameters: a class type or an object instance. 当你想要访问信息和你有对象的实例，使用的组件调用的方法。When you want to access information and you have an instance of the object, use the method that calls for a component. 使用仅在不具有对象的实例时调用的类类型的方法。Use the method that calls for the class type only when you do not have an instance of the object. 由缓存属性和事件速度。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常情况下，它们是常量对象的生存期内。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计人员可以更改对象上的属性的集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果出现这种情况，则必须调用方法来更新缓存。If this is the case, then the method must be called to update the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将类级别属性添加到组件的指定实例。The method adds class-level attributes to the specified instance of a component. 由于这是使用 Visual Studio Windows 窗体设计器和属性窗口中的应用程序的一个常见要求，此方法通过创建已合并提供的特性与特性的类型说明提供程序提供了一种快捷方式类上存在。Because this is a common requirement of applications using the Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer and Properties window, this method provides a shortcut by creating a type description provider that merges the provided attributes with the attributes that already exist on the class. 返回值是用于将属性添加的类型说明提供程序。The return value is the type description provider that was used to add the attributes. 此提供程序随后可以传递给方法时不再需要添加的属性。This provider can later be passed to the method when the added attributes are no longer needed.

summary.span: 为给定的编辑器基类型添加编辑器表。

span.span: Adds an editor table for the given editor base type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加给定的编辑器基类型的编辑器表。The method adds an editor table for the given editor base type. 通常情况下，编辑器被指定为在组件上的元数据。Typically, editors are specified as metadata on a component. 但是，如果没有元数据请求的编辑器基类型可以找到关联的组件上如果可以找到一个将搜索编辑器类型的编辑器表。However, if no metadata for a requested editor base type can be found on the component, the associated will search an editor table for the editor type, if one can be found. 编辑器表添加到的类型说明符后，它不能删除，并拥有的类型描述符。Once an editor table has been added to a type descriptor, it cannot be removed and is owned by the type descriptor. 类型描述符自由地可能会使对此表进行修改。The type descriptor may freely make modifications to this table. 编辑器表的格式使用数据类型作为键，使用编辑器作为值。The format for an editor table uses data types as keys and editors as values. 表中的条目的值部分表示编辑器实例。The value portion of an entry in the table represents an editor instance. 它可以具有三个值之一。It can have one of three values. 如果它包含一个字符串，则类型描述符将假设这是该对象的类型，然后加载该类型的完全限定的名称。If it contains a string, the type descriptor will assume this is a fully qualified name of a type, and then load the type for the object. 如果它包含一个类型，则将创建此类型的实例以获取编辑器。If it contains a type, an instance of this type will be created to obtain an editor. 最后，值部分可能包含实际的编辑器实例。Finally, the value portion may contain an actual editor instance. 如果类型描述符将解析为实例的编辑器，它将存储恢复到的表以供将来使用的实例。If the type descriptor resolves an editor to an instance, it will store the instance back into the table for future use.

summary.span: 为某个组件的单个实例添加类型描述提供程序。

span.span: Adds a type description provider for a single instance of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加提供类型信息的组件的单个实例的类型说明提供程序。The method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for a single instance of a component. 如果此方法，该提供程序的添加提供程序方法将不会调用，因为该实例已存在。If a provider is added by this method, the provider's method will not be called because the instance already exists. 此方法不维护对该组件的硬引用，因此不会阻止该组件正在完成。This method does not maintain a hard reference to the component, so it does not prevent the component from finalizing. 它是可以添加相同类型或对象的多个类型说明提供程序。It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object. 如果发生这种情况，将以独占方式使用的第一个类型说明提供程序遇到提供类型信息。If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively. 由于类型信息提供程序存储在堆栈中，添加的最后一个提供程序将第一个查询。Since type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried. 此行为使和方法用于将推送和弹出类型说明提供程序为特定方案所必需的。This behavior enables the and methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios. 如果成功，此方法会调用方法`instance`参数。If successful, this method calls the method on the `instance` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 此方法的两个版本生成不同的作用域的结果。The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes. 方法采用参数只影响该单一实例指定的组件。The method that takes an parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified. 与此相反，另一重载，其将参数，会影响该类型所描述的组件的所有实例。In contrast, the other overload, which takes a parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type. 使用方法如果你需要从部分受信任代码调用。Use the method if you need to call from partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加提供类型信息的指定的类、 派生的类中，以及这些类型的所有实例的类型说明提供程序。The method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for the specified class, derived classes, and all instances of these types. > [!NOTE] > `type`参数可以是任何类型，包括一个接口。The `type` parameter can be any type, including an interface. 例如，若要提供自定义类型和实例信息的所有组件，会指定`typeof(IComponent)`。For example, to provide custom type and instance information for all components, you would specify `typeof(IComponent)`. 传递`typeof(object)`将调用要为所有类型提供类型信息的提供程序。Passing `typeof(object)` will call the provider to supply type information for all types. 此方法不维护任何对象的硬引用，因此不会阻止对象正在完成。This method does not maintain a hard reference to any object, so it does not prevent objects from finalizing. 它是可以添加相同类型或对象的多个类型说明提供程序。It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object. 如果发生这种情况，将以独占方式使用的第一个类型说明提供程序遇到提供类型信息。If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively. 由于类型信息提供程序存储在堆栈中，添加的最后一个提供程序将第一个查询。Because type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried. 此行为使和方法用于将推送和弹出类型说明提供程序为特定方案所必需的。This behavior enables the and methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios. 如果成功，此方法会调用方法`type`参数。If successful, this method calls the method on the `type` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 此方法的两个版本生成不同的作用域的结果。The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes. 方法采用参数只影响该单一实例指定的组件。The method that takes an parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified. 与此相反，另一重载，其将参数，会影响该类型所描述的组件的所有实例。In contrast, the other overload, which takes a parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type. 使用方法如果你需要从部分受信任代码调用。Use the method if you need to call from partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个主证书和一个辅助对象之间的关联。The method creates an association between a primary and a secondary object. 创建关联后，设计器或其他筛选机制可以添加到主对象的属性集路由到任一对象的属性。Once an association is created, a designer or other filtering mechanism can add properties that route to either object into the primary object's property set. 对主对象，进行属性调用时将调用方法以解析为其类型参数相关的实际对象实例。When a property invocation is made against the primary object, the method will be called to resolve the actual object instance that is related to its type parameter. 一个用于维护的主要和次要对象之间的关联; 因此，此方法不会阻止任一对象被完成，并且被垃圾回收。A is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not prevent either object from being finalized and reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的属性方法可能会动态修改从原始组件的源列表的扩展程序提供程序 ()，筛选服务 ()，和属性筛选器。The attributes returned by the method may be dynamically modified from the original component's source listing by extender providers (), filter services (), and attribute filters. 定义使用的自定义属性时设置为`true`，必须重写属性使其成为唯一。When you define a custom attribute with set to `true`, you must override the property to make it unique. 如果你的特性的所有实例都是唯一的重写返回你的特性的对象标识。If all instances of your attribute are unique, override to return the object identity of your attribute. 如果只有某些特性的实例是唯一的返回值从将在这些情况下返回是否相等。If only some instances of your attribute are unique, return a value from that would return equality in those cases. 例如，某些属性具有用作唯一键的构造函数参数。For example, some attributes have a constructor parameter that acts as a unique key. 对于这些属性的返回值的构造函数参数从属性。For these attributes, return the value of the constructor parameter from the property. > [!NOTE] > 默认实现返回而不考虑的值的类型标识属性。The default implementation of returns the type identity regardless of the value of the property. 若要返回的多个实例属性从，你的特性必须重写属性。In order to return multiple instances of an attribute from the , your attribute must override the property. ## Examples 此方法的示例，请参阅方法。For an example of this method, see the method.

span.span: Clears the properties and events for the specified component from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由缓存属性和事件速度。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常情况下，它们是常量对象的生存期内。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计人员可以更改对象上的属性的集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果是这样，它们应调用此方法以清除该对象的属性和事件说明符。If they do, they should call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object. 此方法仅在设计时使用。This method is used only at design time. 在运行时不使用它。It is not used during run time. 此方法也会引发事件时的属性或事件的组件的更改。This method also raises a event when the properties or events of a component change. 如果没有调用之前，仅将引发此事件或缓存的信息的方法。This event is only raised if there was a prior call to the or method that cached the information. ## Examples 使用此方法的示例，请参阅类。For an example of using this method, see the class.
